data.lyric:
[ti:Mr. Perfectly Fine (Taylor's Version|From The Vault)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Mr. Perfectly Fine (Taylor's Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:05.74]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:11.49]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:17.24]Mr. perfect face
[00:20.67]Mr. here to stay
[00:24.68]Mr. looked me in the eye and told me you would never go away
[00:31.20]Everything was right
[00:33.73]Mr. I've been waiting for you all my life
[00:38.82]Mr. every single day until the end I will be by your side
[00:43.35]
[00:45.63]But that was when I got to know
[00:47.54]Mr. change of heart
[00:49.58]Mr. leaves me all alone
[00:51.09]I fall apart
[00:53.04]It takes everything in me just to get up each day
[00:56.52]But it's wonderful to see that you're okay
[00:59.57]
[01:00.88]Hello Mr. perfectly fine
[01:04.31]How's your heart after breaking mine
[01:07.64]Mr. always at the right place at the right time baby
[01:14.93]Hello Mr. casually cruel
[01:18.25]Mr. everything revolves around you
[01:21.69]I've been Miss misery since your goodbye
[01:26.31]And you're Mr. perfectly fine
[01:30.91]Mr. never told me why
[01:34.29]Mr. never had to see me cry
[01:38.72]Mr. insincere apology so he doesn't look like the bad guy
[01:45.30]He goes about his day
[01:48.29]Forgets he ever even heard my name
[01:52.90]Well I thought you might be different than the rest
[01:55.36]I guess you're all the same
[02:00.10]Because I hear he's got his arm 'round a brand new girl
[02:04.05]I've been picking up my heart
[02:05.53]He's been picking up her
[02:07.15]And I never got past what you put me through
[02:10.54]But it's wonderful to see that it never phased you
[02:14.72]Hello Mr. perfectly fine
[02:18.41]How's your heart after breaking mine
[02:21.84]Mr. always at the right place at the right time baby
[02:29.04]Hello Mr. casually cruel
[02:32.47]Mr. everything revolves around you
[02:35.98]I've been Miss misery since your goodbye
[02:40.49]And you're Mr. perfectly fine
[02:57.21]So dignified in your well pressed suit
[03:01.05]So strategized
[03:02.36]All the eyes on you
[03:04.30]Sashay away to your seat
[03:06.81]It's the best seat
[03:08.55]In the best room
[03:11.34]Oh he's so smug
[03:12.92]Mr. always wins
[03:14.88]So far above me in every sense
[03:18.41]So far above feeling anything
[03:23.70]And it's really such a shame
[03:27.48]It's such a shame
[03:30.66]Cause I was Miss here to stay
[03:34.38]Now I'm Miss gonna be alright someday
[03:38.97]And someday maybe you'll miss me
[03:40.99]But by then you'll be Mr. too late
[03:46.72]Goodbye Mr. perfectly fine
[03:50.07]How's your heart after breaking mine
[03:53.60]Mr. always at the right place at the right time baby
[04:00.80]Goodbye Mr. casually cruel
[04:04.20]Mr. everything revolves around you
[04:07.74]I've been Miss misery for the last time
[04:12.22]And you're Mr. perfectly fine
[04:16.95]You're perfectly fine
[04:20.24]Mr. look me in the eye and tell me you would never go away
[04:27.14]You said you'd never go away
data.trans:
[ti:Mr. Perfectly Fine (Taylor's Version|From The Vault)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.74]//
[00:11.49]//
[00:17.24]你 帅气完美的脸庞
[00:20.67]你 耐心相伴的良伴
[00:24.68]你直视我的眼眸 信誓旦旦向我承诺相守永远
[00:31.20]在我眼里 一切是那般美好
[00:33.73]我曾坚信你是我此生不渝的守候
[00:38.82]每个日日夜夜 我会伴你左右直至地老天荒
[00:43.35]
[00:45.63]而直到最后一刻我才幡然醒悟
[00:47.54]情已逝 一切终归是我的一厢情愿
[00:49.58]你留我默默舔舐情伤
[00:51.09]我陷入崩溃无助的绝境
[00:53.04]强打精神起床似乎耗光我所有力气
[00:56.52]不过见你丝毫不受影响 我很高兴
[00:59.57]
[01:00.88]好久不见啊 好好先生
[01:04.31]在你伤透我的心后 你是否依旧安然无恙？
[01:07.64]你总是在合适的时间及时出现 亲爱的
[01:14.93]别来无恙吧 绝情冷酷的你
[01:18.25]习惯了以自己为中心的你
[01:21.69]自你的决绝道别后 我一直在痛苦中沉沦
[01:26.31]你啊你 曾是我心中的完美王子啊
[01:30.91]只是你 不曾告诉我究竟是为何
[01:34.29]只是你 不曾看过我潸然泪流
[01:38.72]你虚情假意的道歉 不过是让自己看起来不那么薄情罢了
[01:45.30]每一天你都忙忙碌碌
[01:48.29]几乎都快忘了有我这号人
[01:52.90]好吧 我还以为或许你跟别的男人不一样
[01:55.36]我想 你们是一类人
[02:00.10]因为我已耳闻你早就另觅新欢
[02:04.05]我试着为自己治愈心伤
[02:05.53]而你却努力的抚慰她心
[02:07.15]你让我所遭受的一切 我仍是无法释怀
[02:10.54]只是见你丝毫不受影响 我很高兴
[02:14.72]好久不见啊 好好先生
[02:18.41]在你伤透我的心后 你是否依旧安然无恙？
[02:21.84]你总是在合适的时间及时出现 亲爱的
[02:29.04]别来无恙吧 绝情冷酷的你
[02:32.47]习惯了以自己为中心的你
[02:35.98]自你决绝道别后 我一直在痛苦中沉沦
[02:40.49]你啊你 曾是我心中的完美王子啊
[02:57.21]一身平整西装的你 是那么的谦逊有礼
[03:01.05]我小心谨慎的筹谋
[03:02.36]目光始终追随于你
[03:04.30]你离开你的座位
[03:06.81]那应该是整个包间里
[03:08.55]最瞩目也是最佳的中心位置
[03:11.34]噢 你是那么的自以为是
[03:12.92]你啊你 总以为自己绝无失手
[03:14.88]总以为各个方面都碾压我
[03:18.41]总是目中无人 自视甚高
[03:23.70]往事不堪回首
[03:27.48]不堪回首
[03:30.66]因为曾经的我是那么的痴迷于你
[03:34.38]如今我坚信我终会治愈心伤 焕然新生
[03:38.97]或许有那么一天 你也会想起我
[03:40.99]不过到了那一天 你要知道为时已晚
[03:46.72]挥手告别 完美王子
[03:50.07]在你伤透我的心后 你是否依旧安然无恙？
[03:53.60]你总是在合适的时间及时出现 亲爱的
[04:00.80]挥手告别 绝情的你
[04:04.20]习惯了以自己为中心的你
[04:07.74]就让我最后一次在痛苦中沦陷
[04:12.22]你啊你 曾是我心中的完美王子啊
[04:16.95]那般完美的你
[04:20.24]你直视我的眼眸 信誓旦旦向我承诺相守永远
[04:27.14]你曾信誓旦旦向我承诺相守永远
